word_mean_info__list.difference: 本义为“日报”，现在可指定期发生的周刊、月刊、季刊等或指学术团体出版的刊物、杂志或学报。
指刊登各种文章、小说、诗歌、评议的杂志。
系报刊总称，也指报界或报业。
通常指除日报以外的定期出版刊物。
多指登载评论性文章或讨论重大事件的文章的刊物。
一般指每日出版的报纸。

bilingual.source: Refer back to Book 1 Unit 3 to review the features of a play.
bilingual.target: 回顾第一册第三单元，复习戏剧的特点。

bilingual.source: We need to review last month's work.
bilingual.target: 我们需要回顾上个月的工作。

bilingual.source: He is taping the interview for later review.
bilingual.target: 他正在录制采访以便稍后回顾。

bilingual.source: He likes to review the good times from the past.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢回顾过去的美好时光。

bilingual.source: The teacher asked us to review the textbook content.
bilingual.target: 老师要求我们回顾课本内容。

bilingual.source: In the meantime, let's review the project plan.
bilingual.target: 同时，我们来回顾一下项目计划。

bilingual.source: Before diving into details, let's review the topline.
bilingual.target: 在深入细节之前，让我们先回顾一下主要内容。

bilingual.source: We need a summative review to understand the overall performance.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个总结性的回顾来了解整体表现。

bilingual.source: I will rec the meeting so we can review it later.
bilingual.target: 我会录音会议，这样我们可以稍后回顾。

bilingual.source: Now let's review the steps of wet-chalk drawing.
bilingual.target: 现在让我们回顾一下湿粉笔画的步骤。

list.abstract: review(英 [rɪˈvjuː]，美 [rɪˈvjuː])，英语单词。作名词为审查；评估；中止快速倒带重放装置；回顾。作动词为检查；评估；检阅；评论。 review的近义词：comment；retrospection。
REVIEW，中文名洄顾，国产潮流复古品牌 。品牌由杭州大捷品牌管理有限公司于2016年注册，REVIEW是一个负责产品设计、营销推广的品牌，主营珠宝首饰、高级腕表等轻奢配饰。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't you? Well, let us review the facts. I have lost a valuable paper knife. Given to the late Lord Grantham by the King of Sweden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？我们来回顾一下事实，我丢了一把很贵重的裁纸刀，是瑞典国王赠给已故的格兰瑟姆伯爵的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hmm, yes, you did. Now, to review the following provisions are hereby activated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，没错，我们再来温故一下需要执行哪些条例。

yingyinNormal.en: Rachel? Yeah. Remind me to review with you which pot is decaf and which is regular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，提醒我跟你复习哪壶是低咖啡因的，哪壶不是。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've got two weapons briefs under security review by the DOD. Derivative drivel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有两篇武器论文已经经过国防部的安全审查。毫无创意的废物。

yingyinNormal.en: And we've agreed to review and correct any mistakes in the fine copy. And I will be taping this interview, also.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们同意为留下完美记录会对任何错误，进行不断地核查和修正。而且我也会对本次会面进行录音。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not the way the legal system works. This process is based on an objective review of the facts, not of the lies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样不符合法律程序，申请注销得根据客观事实，而不是谎言。

yingyinNormal.en: And when the story is done, Ego stands, thanks us for the meal and leaves without another word. The following day his review appears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当解释告一段落，伊古起身致谢，离开，没有再说半句话。第二天伊古的评论刊登在报上。

yingyinNormal.en: And we'll continue to constantly review our measures and update them as needed to make sure we're doing everything we can to keep Americans safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们将继续不断审查我们的措施，在必要的时候进行修改，以便确保我们在做着我们能做的任何事情来保护美国人的安全。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't fire him. What! LeClaire likes it, yeah? She made a point of telling you so. If she write a review to that effect and find out you fired the cook responsible...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能开除他，傅培美喜欢那锅汤，对吧? 而且她也指名要见你，如果她发表评论，却发现你炒了煮汤的厨师...

yingyinNormal.en: My last review condemned it to the tourist trade. I said, "Gusteau has finally found his rightful place in history right alongside another equally famous chef, Monsieur Boyardee."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我上一次的评鉴是在旅游手册上，我说道“食神终于找他的历史地位等同另一位餐包师傅莫榭尔．包亚迪”。

yingyinNormal.en: Got it. All right, I'm thinking one way to counter bias in the peer-review process, is for papers to be submitted under gender-neutral names. Like S. Smith instead of Samantha Smith.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明白，我想到了一个避免在同行评审阶段遭受歧视的方法，就是报告都用中性名字递交，比如S·史密斯，而不是沙曼莎·史密斯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 同行评估；同行审查；同业审查

sense_info_list.en: examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary

examination_example.sentence: Working with the American Statistical Association, the journal has appointed seven experts to a statistics board of <highlight>reviewing</highlight> editors (SBoRE).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该杂志与美国统计协会合作，任命了7名专家加入统计评审编辑委员会（SBoRE）。

examination_example.sentence: The comprehensive spending <highlight>review</highlight> offers an opportunity for the government to help rectify this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全面的支出审查为政府提供了一个帮助纠正这一问题的机会。

examination_example.sentence: They could cement the status quo of peer-<highlight>reviewed</highlight> research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们可以巩固同行评议研究的现状。

sense_info_list.en:
write a report of a book, play, film/movie, or others in which you give your opinion of it;
a report in a newspaper or magazine, or on the Internet, television or radio, in which someone gives their opinion of a book, play, film/movie, or others; the act of writing this kind of report
view or inspect for a second time or again
submit a sentence or case for reconsideration by a higher court or authority

make a ceremonial and formal inspection of military or naval forces;
a ceremony that involves an official inspection of soldiers, or others by an important visitor
a lesson in which you look again at something you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

word_usage.usage: under review本身含有被动意思，表示“在检查中，正在审查”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary

examination_example.sentence: In May this year, Burberry announced it was taking fur out of its catwalk shows and <highlight>reviewing</highlight> its use elsewhere in the business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年5月，博柏利宣布将皮草从时装秀中撤出，并重新审视其在其他行业的应用。

sense_info_list.en:
write a report of a book, play, film/movie, or others in which you give your opinion of it;
a report in a newspaper or magazine, or on the Internet, television or radio, in which someone gives their opinion of a book, play, film/movie, or others; the act of writing this kind of report
view or inspect for a second time or again
think about past events, for example to try to understand why they happened

word_usage.usage:
review一般用作及物动词，review sth.，但也可用作不及物动词，常与介词for连用。
示例：He reviewed for the test last light.
他昨晚为考试复习了。
review the lesson指“温课”，是美式英语，在英式英语中相当于revise the lesson或者go over the lesson。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

write a report of a book; play; film/movie; or others in which you give your opinion of it;

examination_example.sentence: Most of them are based on systematic <highlight>reviews</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中大部分是基于系统评价的。

examination_example.sentence: Other systematic <highlight>reviews</highlight> support her conclusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他系统评价支持她的结论。

examination_example.sentence: Success is rewarded with good <highlight>reviews</highlight> that encourage more business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成功的回报是鼓励更多业务的好评。

sense_info_list.en: examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary

examination_example.sentence: "Rely on health experts who've <highlight>reviewed</highlight> all the evidence," Liebman says, pointing to the official government Dietary Guidelines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “依靠已经审查了所有证据的健康专家，”利伯曼指着官方的政府膳食指南说。

examination_example.sentence: Monterey Bay, <highlight>reviewed</highlight> California's history and social studies framework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒙特雷湾，回顾了加州的历史和社会研究框架。

examination_example.sentence: This connection happens not only by means of collaborative development, <highlight>review</highlight> and testing, but also at conferences where faculty regularly decide on their textbooks and curricula for the coming year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种联系不仅仅是通过协作开发、审查和测试得以实现，更是在教职人员通常召开的决定来年使用何种教材、开设何种课程的会议上体现出来。

sense_info_list.en: view or inspect for a second time or again

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>review</highlight> what is learned in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 复习课堂上所学的内容。

sense_info_list.en: think about past events; for example to try to understand why they happened

word_usage.usage: review the lesson指“温课”，是美式英语，在英式英语中相当于revise the lesson或者go over the lesson。

review一般用作及物动词，review sth.，但也可用作不及物动词，常与介词for连用。
示例：He reviewed for the test last light.
他昨晚为考试复习了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 评论作家；评论家；审核人；复查者

sense_info_list.en: write a report of a book, play, film/movie, or others in which you give your opinion of it; a report in a newspaper or magazine, or on the Internet, television or radio, in which someone gives their opinion of a book, play, film/movie, or others; the act of writing this kind of report

examination_example.sentence: Researchers analyzing word-of-mouth communication—e-mails, Web posts and <highlight>reviews</highlight>, face-to-face conversations—found that it tended to be more positive than negative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员分析了口口相传的交流方式——电子邮件、网络帖子和评论、面对面的交谈——发现它的积极作用大于消极作用。

sense_info_list.en: examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary

examination_example.sentence: Engineers come and really do an in-person <highlight>review</highlight>, and…it's not a very nice thing at time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工程师们会亲自来做评估，这在当时不是一件很好的事情。

sense_info_list.en: view or inspect for a second time or again

examination_example.sentence: Miranda has undertaken a <highlight>review</highlight> of all of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 米兰达已经对它们全部进行了复习。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Read a book <highlight>review</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读书评。

examination_example.sentence: After you go to a restaurant or stay in a hotel, you can post a <highlight>review</highlight> with one of your apps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你去餐馆或住酒店后，你可以用你的某个应用发布评论。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the <highlight>reviews</highlight> by the readers is right about this book?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者对这本书的哪些评论是正确的？

sense_info_list.en: examine or assess something formally with the possibility or intention of instituting change if necessary

examination_example.sentence: If you want to book a hotel, how can a <highlight>review</highlight> app help you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您想预订酒店，点评应用软件能帮您做什么呢？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Review</highlight> apps help us evaluate service and products before we hand over our money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 点评应用软件帮助我们在付款前对服务和产品进行评估。

examination_example.sentence: How to <highlight>review</highlight> the plan with his friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何与他的朋友一起评估计划。

sense_info_list.en: a lesson in which you look again at something you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

examination_example.sentence: If the pages of your notebook are well organized, you are more likely to <highlight>review</highlight> the words and their information over and over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的笔记本页面井井有条，你更有可能一遍又一遍地复习单词和相关知识。

examination_example.sentence: After class, remember to <highlight>review</highlight> what you have learned by reading your notes or making a mind map.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 课后，记得通过阅读你的笔记或制作思维导图来复习所学内容。

examination_example.sentence: Have you <highlight>reviewed</highlight> chemistry for the coming exam?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为即将到来的考试复习了化学吗？

word_usage.usage:
review一般用作及物动词，review sth.，但也可用作不及物动词，常与介词for连用。
示例：He reviewed for the test last light.
他昨晚为考试复习了。
review the lesson指“温课”，是美式英语，在英式英语中相当于revise the lesson或者go over the lesson。
